title: Overwatch 2
shortDescription: A hero-focused first-person team shooter from Blizzard Entertainment.

title: Diablo Immortal
shortDescription: Built for mobile and also released on PC, Diablo Immortal fills in the gaps between Diablo II and III in an MMOARPG environment.

title: Lost Ark
shortDescription: Smilegate’s free-to-play multiplayer ARPG is a massive adventure filled with lands waiting to be explored, people waiting to be met, and an ancient evil waiting to be destroyed.

title: PUBG: BATTLEGROUNDS
shortDescription: Get into the action in one of the longest running battle royale games PUBG Battlegrounds.

title: Enlisted
shortDescription: Get ready to command your own World War II military squad in Gaijin and Darkflow Software’s MMO squad-based shooter Enlisted.

title: Forge of Empires
shortDescription: A free to play 2D browser-based online strategy game, become the leader and raise your city.

title: Drakensang Online
shortDescription: A free to play browser-based top-down hack-and-slash 3D MMORPG similar to games in the Diablo series.

title: MultiVersus
shortDescription: The Warner Bros lineup meets Smash in Player First Games’ MultiVersus.

title: Genshin Impact
shortDescription: If you’ve been looking for a game to scratch that open-world action RPG itch, one with perhaps a bit of Asian flair, then you’re going to want to check out miHoYo’s Genshin Impact.

title: Fall Guys
shortDescription: Play the most competitive massively multiplayer party royale game featuring beans ever for free on a variety of platforms.

title: Game Of Thrones Winter Is Coming
shortDescription: A free-to-play browser-based RTS based on the George R.R. Martin novels and popular HBO series.

title: Elvenar
shortDescription: A browser based city-building strategy MMO set in the fantasy world of Elvenar.

title: Neverwinter
shortDescription: A free-to-play 3D action MMORPG based on the acclaimed Dungeons & Dragons fantasy roleplaying game.

title: Dark Orbit Reloaded
shortDescription: A browser-based 3D space-combat MMO with a massive playerbase!

title: Halo Infinite
shortDescription: For the first time ever, a free-to-play Halo experience is available in the form of Halo Infinite’s multiplayer.

title: Eternal Fury
shortDescription: A free-to-play ARPG from R2 Games!

title: Flyff Universe
shortDescription: Get the full Flyff experience on any platform with the free-to-play browser-based MMORPG Flyff Universe.

title: Phantasy Star Online 2 New Genesis
shortDescription: The legacy of Phantasy Star Online 2 continues a thousand years later!

title: Crossout
shortDescription: A post-apocalyptic MMO vehicle combat game!

title: World of Warships
shortDescription: A 3D free to play naval action-themed MMO from the creators of World of Tanks!

title: War Thunder
shortDescription: A MMO shooter that puts you in command of hundreds of the finest combat vehicles of World War II.

title: World of Tanks
shortDescription: If you like blowing up tanks, with a quick and intense game style you will love this game!

title: Palia
shortDescription: A cozy MMO with homebuilding and some adventure.

title: League of Angels - Heaven's Fury
shortDescription: A free-to-play, browser-based fantasy online action RPG based loosely on Western mythology!

title: Tower of Fantasy
shortDescription: Tower of Fantasy is a 3D open-world RPG, anime-style sci-fi MMO RPG game with unique characters and beautiful open vistas!

title: Noah’s Heart
shortDescription: Noah’s Heart is an open-world MMORPG game with a focus on exploration and socialization.

title: Valorant
shortDescription: Test your mettle in Riot Games’ character-based FPS shooter Valorant.

title: Phantasy Star Online 2
shortDescription: Welcome to ARKS, and elite task force searching dangerous planets for the corrupted Falspawn in Phantasy Star 2 Online, Sega’s popular, free-to-play sci-fi MMORPG.

title: Call Of Duty: Warzone
shortDescription: A standalone free-to-play battle royale and modes accessible via Call of Duty: Modern Warfare.

title: Destiny 2
shortDescription: A free-to-play multiplayer Sci-Fi MMOFPS from Bungie.

title: Dauntless
shortDescription: A free-to-play, co-op action RPG with gameplay similar to Monster Hunter.

title: Apex Legends
shortDescription: A free-to-play strategic battle royale game featuring 60-player matches and team-based play.

title: Fortnite
shortDescription: A free-to-play, standalone mode of Epic Game's Fortnite.

title: Albion Online
shortDescription: A free-to-play cross-platform sandbox MMO developed and published by Sandbox Interactive GmbH.

title: Blade and Soul
shortDescription: A free-to-play martial arts MMORPG that tasks players with learning combination attacks.

title: Brawlhalla
shortDescription: A free-to-play 2D platform fighter inspired by the Smash Bros.

title: Trove
shortDescription: A free to play Sandbox massively multiplayer online role-playing game!

title: Heroes & Generals
shortDescription: A World War II-based MMOFPS that mixes infantry, armor, and aircraft.

title: Warface
shortDescription: A free-to-play multiplayer online FPS from Crytek, makers of the Far Cry and Crysis series of games.

title: Smite
shortDescription: A popular free-to-play 3D MOBA where you take on the role of an ancient god.

title: Warframe
shortDescription: A cooperative free-to-play third person online action shooter set in an stunning sci-fi world.

title: PlanetSide 2
shortDescription: A free-to-play open-world FPS that pits three factions against each other in a never-ending war.

title: Guild Wars 2
shortDescription: A free-to-play MMORPG, the follow-up to ArenaNet's popular Guild Wars.

title: Goodgame Empire
shortDescription: A free to play medieval strategy browser game. Build you own castle and create a powerful army!

title: Star Trek Online
shortDescription: A free-to-play, 3D, Sci-Fi MMORPG based on the popular Star Trek series.

title: RuneScape
shortDescription: A popular 3D browser MMORPG boasting a huge player base and 15 years of content.

title: Warhammer 40,000: Warpforge
shortDescription: A free-to-play CCG set in the Warhammer 40K universe.

title: Synced
shortDescription: A free-to-play co-op sci-fi shooter.

title: Warhaven
shortDescription: A free-to-play, medieval fantasy PvP game from Nexon.

title: Microvolts: Recharged
shortDescription: A lobby-based third-person shooter with a toy-theme.

title: Hawked
shortDescription: A free-to-play PvPvE treasure hunting shooter.

title: Tales Of Yore
shortDescription: A 2D MMORPG with lots of RPG tropes.

title: Waven
shortDescription: A free-to-play online tactical RPG from Ankama.

title: Town of Salem 2
shortDescription: A deduction game set in Salem.

title: Naraka: Bladepoint
shortDescription: A free-to-play melee focused battle royale.

title: Undawn
shortDescription: A free-to-play open-world survival RPG developed by LightSpeed studios and published by Level Infinite.

title: Temtem Showdown
shortDescription: A 2v2 competitive multiplayer battle simulator set in the Temtem universe.

title: Eden Eternal
shortDescription: A free to play fantasy MMORPG with cute anime-inspired graphics.

title: Veiled Experts
shortDescription: A free-to-play multiplayer shooter game focused on the search and destroy mode of classic shooters.

title: Jected - Rivals
shortDescription: A free-to-play game mixing extreme sports with destructible vehicles and a unique ejection mechanic.

title: Ethyrial: Echoes of Yore
shortDescription: A old-school MMORPG set in a world on the brink of Civil War

title: Dead Cide Club
shortDescription: A free-to-play, side-scrolling shooter with a variety of modes and character types to choose from.

title: Kartrider: Drift
shortDescription: A free-to-play multiplayer online racing game set in the Kartrider franchise.

title: Warlander
shortDescription: A medieval-style combat game with a selection of modes and characters.

title: Fangs
shortDescription: A 4v4 MOBA with hero-specific strategies.

title: Summoners War: Chronicles
shortDescription: A multi-platform ARPG set in the Summoners War universe.

title: Marvel Snap
shortDescription: A fast paced strategy card game set in the Marvel universe.

title: World Boss
shortDescription: An experimental FPS based on io and roguelike gameplay.

title: Omega Strikers
shortDescription: A 3v3 socccer-style game with knockouts.

title: Gundam Evolution
shortDescription: A 6v6 team-based shooter based on the Gundam multiverse

title: Deathverse: Let It Die
shortDescription: A game of survival where contestants are pit against each other in a life or death game show.

title: Galahad 3093
shortDescription: A 12v12 team shooter featuring mechs based on Arthurian legend.

title: Aero Tales Online
shortDescription: Aero Tales Online: The World is a free-to-play 3D anime-style MMORPG with PvP and PvE elements. The game revolves around the “mysterious story of the Key of Skylight”.

title: Magic Spellslingers
shortDescription: Magic Spellslingers is the latest entry based on Witzards of the Coast’s popular card game Magic: The Gathering.

title: A.V.A Global
shortDescription: A.V.A is a free-to-play online first-person shooter with multiple game modes, unique customizations, as well as PvP and PvE gameplay.

title: Lost Light
shortDescription: A post-apocalyptic shooter built around creating a realistic experience.

title: Temperia: Soul of Majestic
shortDescription: Fans of collectible card games, are you looking for something a bit different from the normal fare? Then a peek at Moonwolf Entertainment and A2 Softworks’ Temperia: Soul of Majestic might be in order.

title: Chimeraland
shortDescription: Explore the open-world sandbox MMO game set in a mythical world. Play as one of a large number of races, from jelly-fish to dragon-person – or even a regular old human if that’s your thing. Explore the land, gather resources, craft items, build homes and more.

title: World of Runes
shortDescription: An adorable anime-style MMO featuring cute pets and collectable cards.

title: Roller Champions
shortDescription: What if you could player roller derby, but in a more organized and less physically dangerous environment?

title: Space Punks
shortDescription: Space Punks is a sci-fi co-op looter shooter with graphics and humor that will likely appeal to the Borderlands fans among us.

title: Goose, Goose, DUCK
shortDescription: A social deduction game with geese.

title: Swords of Legends Online
shortDescription: Explore a fantasy world based on Chinese mythology in Gameforge’s action MMORPG Swords of Legends Online!

title: Super Squad
shortDescription: Prepare yourself. It’s time for Mayhem. Super Squad is a multi-player online shoot-’em-up (or MOSH)!

title: Sherwood Extreme
shortDescription: High action arcade shooter Sherwood Extreme sends players on a mission to save the kingdom!

title: Smash Legends
shortDescription: Classic fairy tales get wild with 5minlab and LINE Games Corporation’s brawl-action game Smash Legends.

title: Drifters Loot the Galaxy
shortDescription: Grab your Driftpacs and grappling hooks, it’s time to loot. Pick a character and dive into Blind Squirrel’s team-based shooter, Drifters Loot the Galaxy.

title: Primordials: Battle of Gods
shortDescription: Build armies and fight for control of the realm in Global Dodo Entertainment’s 1v1 strategy game Primordials: Battle of Gods.

title: Super Mecha Champions
shortDescription: Super Mecha Champions is a PC port of the mobile anime PvP game from NetEease, featuring a variety of modes but focusing on battle royale.

title: Chroma: Bloom And Blight
shortDescription: Competitive card game fans have a new, completely free option to add to their list.

title: Blankos Block Party
shortDescription: What happens when you take the vinyl collectible toy experience and combine it with an open-world multiplayer game? You get Blankos Block Party!

title: Slapshot: Rebound
shortDescription: Do you like hockey? How about physic-based multiplayer, arcade-style sports games with cute graphics? Well, this is the one for you.

title: Rogue Company
shortDescription: From Hi-Rez Studios, the team that brought you Smite and Paladins, comes Rogue Company, a cross-platform, competitive team-based third person shooter.

title: Eternal Return: Black Survival
shortDescription: Combining elements from battle royale, MOBA, and the survival genres, Eternal Return: Black Survival is a game designed with a broad audience in mind.

title: Blood of Steel
shortDescription: Blood of Steel is an online competitive strategy game featuring some of the most well-known figures throughout medieval history. Choose your general – a Crusader, Viking, Ninja or one of those from the Three Kingdoms. Build your kingdom and command armies in epic PvP battles using classic medieval warfare tactics.

title: Spellbreak
shortDescription: Spellbreak is a multiplayer, multi-platform battle-royale where player take on the role of a “battlemage” mastering elemental magic and using spells to compete against other players.

title: Rocket League
shortDescription: Get your car-soccer gaming on for free with Psyonix’s Rocket League. The popular competitive multi-player game is a popular offering with over 57 million players.

title: Armor Valor
shortDescription: Build your empire with the help of mythical heroes and well thought out strategy in R2 Games’ strategy RPG Armor Valor.

title: Unfortunate Spacemen
shortDescription: Unfortunate Spacemen is a co-op multiplayer game about Shapeshifting with a Co-op Story Mode, lots of objectives and more!

title: Jade Goddess
shortDescription: Jade Goddess is a free-to-play, browser based MMO inspired by Eastern mythology.

title: Shop Titans
shortDescription: A free-to-play RPG shopkeeper simulation game where you are responsible for designing and maintaining your own shop.

title: Survivor Legacy
shortDescription: Survivor Legacy is a free-to-play zombie-themed strategy game from R2 Games.

title: Bombergrounds: Battle Royale
shortDescription: A free-to-play massively multiplayer battle Royale game inspired by the old-shool Bomberman games!

title: Kakale Online
shortDescription: A free-to-play top-down 2D MMORPG from developer and publisher ViVa Games.

title: Darwin Project
shortDescription: A free-to-play 10-player battle royale game set just prior to an impeding ice age.

title: Legends of Runeterra
shortDescription: A free-to-play CCG based on Riot Games' MOBA League of Legends.

title: CRSED: F.O.A.D.
shortDescription: Take the battle royale genre and add  mystical powers and you have CRSED: F.O.A.D. (Aka Cuisine Royale: Second Edition)

title: Mirage Online Classic
shortDescription: A browser-based free-to-play spiritual successor to 2001's Mirage Online.

title: Inferna
shortDescription: A cross-platform MMO from indie developer and publisher Inferna Limited, designed for players seeking a classic experience.

title: Ultimate Pirates
shortDescription: A browser-based strategy MMO published for both desktop and mobile browsers by Gameforge.

title: Fer.al
shortDescription: If you’ve ever wanted to be a creature of myth and hang out with other mytical creatures, Wildworks’ Fer.al can help you live the dream.

title: Battle Breakers
shortDescription: A multi-platform free-to-play RPG developed and published by Epic Games for PC and Android devices.

title: Stay Out
shortDescription: An MMORPG featuring urban exploration and shooter elements.

title: PC Futbol Legends
shortDescription: An arcade soccer game inspired by cult arcade games from IDC games.

title: Vampire Empire
shortDescription: A multiplayer strategy game that focuses on the war between vampires and werewolves.

title: Firestone Idle RPG
shortDescription: Set in the fantasy world of Alandria, Firestone is an idle RPG in which players are tasked with building the best possible party of heroes and using them to defeat the undead and orcs that plague the world.

title: Mythgard
shortDescription: Rhino Games Inc.’s CCG Mythgard combines cyberpunk with the heroes, gods, and creatures of the fantasy in a modern setting to create a world where magic competes against technology for control.

title: Dark Knight
shortDescription: A browser-based fantasy MMOARPG wherein players take on the role of a devil hunter descended from the gods.

title: Legends of Aria
shortDescription: A sandbox MMORPG featuring a skill-based system, content that will appeal to both PvE and PvP players, and a robust housing system.

title: Crystal Clash
shortDescription: A free-to-play fantasy RTS developed by Crunchy Leaf Games.

title: Dota Underlords
shortDescription: A free-to-play auto battler strategy game set in the world of Valve's Dota franchise.

title: Minion Masters
shortDescription: A free-to-play strategic minion brawler from Danish developer Betadwarf.

title: Splitgate: Arena Warfare
shortDescription: A free-to-play multiplayer shooter developed and published by 1047 games.

title: Conqueror's Blade
shortDescription: Command your own medieval army in Conqueror's Blade, a war simulator developed by Booming games.

title: Stein.world
shortDescription:
A free-to-play, browser-based online fantasy role 
playing game done in an old-school 
16-bit style.

title: Kards
shortDescription: A free-to-play collectible World War II card game from developer 1939 Games.

title: KurtzPel
shortDescription: A free-to-play third-person action battle game from KOG Games.

title: The Third Age
shortDescription: A free-to-play browser-based Strategy MMO game focused on story-based PvE gameplay!

title: Eternal
shortDescription: A strategy card game designed to take the best elements of Magic the Gathering, Hearthstone, and Hex and combine them all into one game.

title: Artifact
shortDescription: Valve’s Artifact is two games in one. Whether you’re looking for the original Dota 2 trading card game created with the help of card game designer Richard Garfield or something a little more streamlined, Artifact has both in one download.

title: World War 3
shortDescription: A realistic multiplayer tactical FPS.

title: Combat Arms: Reloaded
shortDescription: A free to play modern first person shooter with lots of maps and weapons!

title: Dreadnought
shortDescription: A free-to-play combat flight simulator developed by Yager Development and published by Grey Box.

title: Spacelords
shortDescription: A free-to-play 4v1 sci-fi shooter.

title: Battlerite Royale
shortDescription: A free to play battle royale set in the Battlerite universe.

title: Magic: The Gathering Arena
shortDescription: A free-to-play digital recreation of Wizards of the Coast's popular collectible card game.

title: League of Angels 3
shortDescription: A free-to-play turn-based strategy browser game developed and published by GTArcade Entertainment, Inc.

title: BlackShot: Revolution
shortDescription: Get thrown into the fast-paced action of a virtual war zone and compete against other players.

title: Cosmos Invictus
shortDescription: A strategic collectible card game developed and published by Pegnio Ltd.

title: Realm Royale Reforged
shortDescription: A free-to-play fantasy-themed battle royale game based on Hi-Rez Studio's team shooter Paladins.

title: Empire: World War 3
shortDescription: A free-to-play browser-based action packed strategy game from the developer of Legends of Honor.

title: Totally Accurate Battlegrounds
shortDescription: Take 60 players, throw them on a map together with over 90 weapons, including balloon crossbows, pots and pans, and inflatable hammers, add physics-based parkour and you have Landfall’s Totally Accurate Battlegrounds (TABG).

title: Will To Live
shortDescription: A free-to-play MMORPG-shooter developed and published by AlphaSoft LLC.

title: Battle Arena Heroes Adventure
shortDescription: A MOBA with RPG elements.

title: Spellsworn
shortDescription: A free-to-play arena battle game developed and published by Frogsong Studios AB.

title: Z1 Battle Royale
shortDescription: A highly competitive free-to-play battle royale shooter.

title: Tale Of Toast
shortDescription: A free-to-play open world MMO inspired by classic, core MMOs.

title: Bombtag
shortDescription: A free-to-play multiplayer Bomberman-inspired game.

title: Ironsight
shortDescription: A free-to-play futuristic shooter published by Aeria Games.

title: Dead Maze
shortDescription: A free-to-play 2D isometric MMO full of zombies.

title: Scions of Fate
shortDescription: A friendly free to play MMORPG with easy to pick up controls.

title: My Soul
shortDescription: A free-to-play ARPG distributed by GameSpirit.

title: Wild Terra Online
shortDescription: A medieval sandbox MMO designed with core players in mind.
